section.title: Subscription

p.i: Note: While the user mailing list still works and questions are answerred, it’s more efficient to put your question on Stack Overflow with tag "freemareker". The FreeMarker maintainers are supposed to track questions with that tag.

section.p: To discuss wishes, new features, other deeper issues, subscribe to the freemarker-developer mailing list.

p.a: You can see the lists and subscribe here…

section.title: News interfaces
section.p: All interfaces are two-way (you can both write and read).
